channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiNAC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiNAC

item.title: CVE-2021-41021|2024-08-04T02:59:31.063Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortinac
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in FortiNAC versions 8.8.8 and below and 9.1.2 and below may allow an admin user to escalate the privileges to root via the sudo command.
